review: It's a chromecast. If you're looking at getting one, there's no shortage of information about what it can do. Just get it if you want, it's cheap.
author: Chorca

review: I have owned one for 1 year and very happy.my daughter bought a new 55" smart tv but it didnt have very many apps.so I bought her this because she not only can use netflix but also hbogo, showtime, espn3 to name a few. Also can mirror her samsung 5 on tv for xfinity.etc. very good value for a thid of price of roku3.
author: BW

review: I like my Chromecast quite a bit and we get a lot of use out of it. It's annoying to me that it doesn't work with Amazon streamed videos, though, and that's probably a very important point for Amazon shoppers. I still have to use an HDMI cable to watch movies I purchase from Amazon on my TV, but this is nice for a wireless experience when I'm watching Netflix or YouTube, or if I just want to see something I'm doing on my laptop on a large screen.
author: Amy Druckenmiller

review: Excellent!! I am yet to explore so many tricks
